Si vous avez des questions, des suggestions ou si vous souhaitez collaborer, n’hésitez pas à nous contacter via le formulaire ci-dessous.  

```{=html}
<style>
  form {
    max-width: 500px;
    margin: 20px auto;
    padding: 20px;
    background: var(--quarto-background-color, #f9f9f9);
    border-radius: 8px;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    color: var(--quarto-foreground-color, #000);
  }

  label {
    font-weight: bold;
    display: block;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
  }

  input, textarea {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    border: 1px solid var(--quarto-border-color, #ccc);
    border-radius: 5px;
    font-size: 16px;
    background: var(--quarto-background-color, #fff);
    color: var(--quarto-foreground-color, #000);
  }

  input:focus, textarea:focus {
    border-color: var(--quarto-link-color, #007bff);
    outline: none;
    box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(0, 123, 255, 0.5);
  }

  button {
    background: var(--quarto-link-color, #007bff);
    color: var(--quarto-foreground-color, #fff);
    padding: 10px 15px;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: 0.3s;
  }

  button:hover {
    background: var(--quarto-link-hover-color, #0056b3);
  }
</style>

<form action="https://formspree.io/f/xwpvqolo" method="POST">
  <label for="name">Nom :</label>
  <input type="text" id="name" name="name" required>

  <label for="email">Email :</label>
  <input type="email" id="email" name="email" required>

  <label for="message">Message :</label>
  <textarea id="message" name="message" rows="4" required></textarea>

  <button type="submit">Envoyer</button>
</form>
```
